collection.desc: This XML document contains the procedure for creating Fruit Delight drink.

prep.step: Blend these finely chopped fruits with sugar in a blender.
Add lemon juice and crushed ice cubes to the fruit mix.
Add lemon drink to the mixture to thin down to required liquidity.
Blend all the ingredients to a smooth puree.
Pour the drink in a tall glass and garnish with pineapple wedges and cherries.
